alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; West Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 3:57PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL VALENCIA AND BERNALILLO COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM MDT... At 356 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of South Valley to Rio Communities. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albuquerque, southwestern Rio Rancho, Valencia, Los Lunas, Corrales, Belen, Los Ranchos De Albuquerque, Bosque Farms, Peralta and Rio Communities North. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 137 and 160. Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 188 and 228. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Heavy rains will cause water to pond on roads and in low spots. Fast running water will quickly fill arroyos and ditches.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; West Central Highlands
